016package app.supernaut.fx;
017
018import app.supernaut.Launcher;
019import javafx.application.Application;
020
021import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
022import java.util.ServiceLoader;
023
024/**
025 * Additional required method for launching {@link FxForegroundApp} instances that
026 * are proxied by {@code OpenJfxProxyApplication}.
027 */
028public interface FxLauncher extends Launcher {
029    /**
030     * Construct a {@link FxForegroundApp} that is a delegate to {@code OpenJfxProxyApplication}.
031     * @param jfxApplication The OpenJfx "proxy" app instance
032     * @return A newly constructed (and possibly injected) foreground app
033     */
034    FxForegroundApp createForegroundApp(Application jfxApplication);
035
036    /**
037     * Implementations must implement this method to return a unique name
038     * @return A unique name for this DI-capable {@link Launcher} implementation
039     */
040    String name();
041
042    /**
043     * Find a FxLauncher provider by name
044     *
045     * @param name Name (e.g. "micronaut")
046     * @return an FxLaunder instance
047     * @throws NoSuchElementException if not found
048     */
049    static FxLauncher byName(String name) {
050        ServiceLoader<FxLauncher> loaders = ServiceLoader.load(FxLauncher.class);
051        return loaders.stream()
052                .map(ServiceLoader.Provider::get)
053                .filter(launcher -> launcher.name().equals(name))
054                .findFirst()
055                .orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchElementException("Launcher '" + name + "' not found."));
056    }
057}
